bug.author: zhyj3038
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>bug</denchmark-h>
Hi, after I trained a model, and exported to onnx model, I got this error NameError: name 'yolo_layer' is not defined <denchmark-h:h1>how to reproduce</denchmark-h>
1 train a model 2 set ONNX_EXPORT = True 3 run detect.py then this error occured!

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/zhyj3038>@zhyj3038</denchmark-link> thanks for the bug report! This should be fixed in commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/commit/1d0a4a3ace94567172e2adbabfba0fa553a07f1a>1d0a4a3</denchmark-link> now.
Thanks very much! I have exported a onnx model.
